package.name: zookeeper
package.summary: PHP extension for interfacing with Apache ZooKeeper
package.description: This extension provides API for communicating with ZooKeeper service.
package.notes: - GHPR #22: Respect null's when passed as values during set(), create(), and get(). - GHPR #30: Fix null znode stat object. - GHPR #32: Added deleteNode method. - GHPR #42: Warning and cosmetic fixes. - GHPR #44: Update php_zookeeper.c. - GHPR #45: Return null after zoo_exists returning 0-length directly. - GHPR #48: Make extension compatible with Zookeeper 3.5.0alpha. - GHPR #54: Display ini entries in `phpinfo()`. - GHPR #60: Fix issue #27. - Add PHP7 support.

release.notes: - GHPR #22: Respect null's when passed as values during set(), create(), and get(). - GHPR #30: Fix null znode stat object. - GHPR #32: Added deleteNode method. - GHPR #42: Warning and cosmetic fixes. - GHPR #44: Update php_zookeeper.c. - GHPR #45: Return null after zoo_exists returning 0-length directly. - GHPR #48: Make extension compatible with Zookeeper 3.5.0alpha. - GHPR #54: Display ini entries in `phpinfo()`. - GHPR #60: Fix issue #27. - Add PHP7 support.
- Added session handler support - Added connect() and delete methods - Bug fixes
